mapper.update: update sys_role_perm set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, perm_id = #{permId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, role_id, perm_id, operator, operate_time, operate_ip from sys_role_perm
